name: Branch Policies - Security Permissions - Do not allow bypassing policies
description: Protect important branches in this repository. This policy will ensure that no user has permissions to bypass policies. Learn more: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/organizations/security/security-best-practices?view=azure-devops#secure-azure-repos https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/repos/git/branch-permissions
recommendation:
1. Navigate to Project Settings. 
2. Open the Repositories link under Repos. 
3. Select a repository from the list. 
4. Click on Security tab. 
5. On the page 'User permissions', ensure the 'Bypass policies when completing pull requests' and 'Bypass policies when pushing' user permisions are 'Not set' or 'Deny'. 
6. Under the section 'Git refs permissions', select 'All Branches'. 
7. For all important branches of this repository, ensure the branch security does not set or allow any bypass policies.
